name: **Strawbeach Island _Oileán na Muiríleach_**
description: Strawbeach Island Oileán na Muiríleach L578-413 Sheet 44 NW of Illaunurra, Strawbeach is easiest reached from a pretty, W-facing strand at L585-417, less than 1km to the NE. This is a wee gem of a pleasant, sheep-grazed islet, giving unexpected privacy just off a crowded beach. There is a dependable sandy beach landing in a lagoon on the eastern side. Camp anywhere. No water. Ringed Plover.
